topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d02d216368727226f70600#post_54d02d216368727226f70600
We leave the house at 5am
I sleep during the drive
We start work at 7am
If we leave again at 5pm, and the drive takes an average hour and a half everyday, I get home between 6-7pm, and if traffic gets bad, possibly later
Meaning I spend at least 12 hours a day, driving and working
And I hate
Maybe I'm just being whiny, but I don't care
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d02fb96368725be37b1c00#post_54d02fb96368725be37b1c00
I know
And I appreciate it

But there is only so much time in a day
And sometimes after a long day, I lose all motivation to do anything, and when I get free time I get lazy and just relax and have fun
Which is fine, but sometimes I just want to do something productive or make something or learn something
